# Rachael reckons...

...that sharing knowledge through open source software is the way to go!

Rachael Russo is currently employed at the Australian Bureau of Statistics. She has been providing methodological support for business surveys, covering tasks such as sample design and imputation.

She wishes that she knew about the "gather" function 3 years ago whens he did her honours thesis, which involved a messy dataset. As R is slowly growing to be applicable to official statistics, knowing various ways to easily transform data will be useful.
